TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit GeoCoordinateWatcher extends System.Object implements class System.ComponentModel.INotifyPropertyChanged, class System.Device.Location.IGeoPositionWatcher`1<class System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinate>, class System.IDisposable
Public Class GeoCoordinateWatcher Implements IDisposable, IGeoPositionWatcher(Of GeoCoordinate), INotifyPropertyChanged
type GeoCoordinateWatcher = class interface IDisposable interface INotifyPropertyChanged interface IGeoPositionWatcher<GeoCoordinate>

summary.span: 提供位置基于纬度和经度坐标的数据。

span.span: Supplies location data that is based on latitude and longitude coordinates.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类提供了从当前位置提供程序基于坐标的位置数据。The class supplies coordinate-based location data from the current location provider. 当前的位置提供程序设置优先级最高的计算机上，根据多种因素，如年龄和准确性的数据，所有提供程序位置应用程序请求的准确性和功耗和性能影响与位置提供程序相关联。The current location provider is prioritized as the highest on the computer, based on a number of factors, such as the age and accuracy of the data from all providers, the accuracy requested by location applications, and the power consumption and performance impact associated with the location provider. 随着时间推移，例如，当 GPS 设备失去其附属信号功能和 Wi-fi 三角测量提供程序将在计算机上最准确的提供程序可能会更改当前的位置提供程序。The current location provider might change over time, for instance, when a GPS device loses its satellite signal indoors and a Wi-Fi triangulation provider becomes the most accurate provider on the computer. 若要开始访问位置数据，创建，并调用或若要开始从当前位置提供程序的数据获取。To begin accessing location data, create a and call or to initiate the acquisition of data from the current location provider. 属性可以进行检查，以确定数据是否可用。The property can be checked to determine if data is available. 如果数据不可用，可以获取该位置从一次属性，或通过处理接收持续的位置更新事件。If data is available, you can get the location one time from the property, or receive continuous location updates by handling the event. ， ，并属性支持，以便应用程序可以数据绑定到这些属性。The , , and properties support , so that an application can data-bind to these properties. 在 Windows 7 中，所有类是完全安装位置提供程序的情况下正常运行并能够解析计算机的位置。In Windows 7, all the classes are fully functional if a location provider is installed and able to resolve the computer's location. > [!NOTE] > 在 Windows 7 简易版，唯一受支持的位置提供程序是默认位置中的提供程序控制面板中，并且外接程序必须安装指定纬度和经度。On Windows 7 Starter Edition, the only supported location provider is the Default Location Provider in Control Panel, and an add-in must be installed to specify latitude and longitude. **请注意**中的 Windows 7 之前的 Windows 版本中，以下条件适用：**Note** In versions of Windows prior to Windows 7, the following conditions apply: - 所有可以创建具有构造函数的对象，但属性将始终具有值。All objects that have constructors can be created, but the property will always have the value . - 所指示的位置的属性始终会。The location indicated by the property of will always be . - 将会不引发任何位置事件。No location events will be raised. ## Examples 以下程序演示如何创建和开始使用初始化超时获取数据。The following program shows how to create a and start acquiring data by using an initialization timeout. 如果已知，代码然后输出位置的坐标。The code then prints the coordinates of the location, if known. [!code-csharp[System.Device.Location.GetLocationDataSync1#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Misc/system.device.location.getlocationdatasync1/cs/getlocationdatasync.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Device.Location.GetLocationDataSync1#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Misc/system.device.location.getlocationdatasync1/vb/GetLocationDataSync.vb#1)] 以下程序演示如何通过订阅来接收持续的位置更新事件。The following program shows how to receive continuous location updates by subscribing to events. [!code-csharp[System.Device.Location.GetLocationDataAsync#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Misc/system.device.location.getlocationdataasync/cs/getlocationdataasync.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Device.Location.GetLocationDataAsync#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Misc/system.device.location.getlocationdataasync/vb/GetLocationDataAsync.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property double MovementThreshold { double get(); void set(double value); };
member this.MovementThreshold : double with get, set

summary.span: 必须移动，以米为单位，相对于从最后一个坐标的距离之前的位置提供程序将引发另一个事件事件。

span.span: The distance that must be moved, in meters, relative to the coordinate from the last event, before the location provider raises another event.
Distance, in meters.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 默认移动阈值为零，这意味着任何更改在当前的位置提供程序会导致检测到的位置事件和中的更新属性。The default movement threshold is zero, which means that any change in location detected by the current location provider causes a event and an update in the property. > [!NOTE] > 移动阈值不保证将在所请求的阈值接收事件。The movement threshold does not guarantee that events will be received at the requested threshold. 平台会尝试遵循请求特定移动阈值，但在某些情况下，事件将不引发在请求的阈值。The platform attempts to honor requests for a particular movement threshold, but in some cases, the events will not be raised at the requested threshold. **请注意**中的 Windows 7 之前的 Windows 版本中，以下条件适用：**Note** In versions of Windows prior to Windows 7, the following conditions apply: - 所有可以创建具有构造函数的对象，但属性将始终具有值。All objects that have constructors can be created, but the property will always have the value . - 所指示的位置的属性始终会。The location indicated by the property of will always be . - 将会不引发任何位置事件。No location events will be raised. 下图表示的位置提供程序 （例如，GPS 设备） 提供到计算机的位置坐标。The following diagram represents location coordinates that the location provider (for example, a GPS device) supplies to the computer. P1，在图中，表示包含在的位置数据事件，和 P2、 P3 和 P4 表示内移动阈值的点。P1, in the diagram, represents the location data included in a event, and P2, P3, and P4 represent points within the movement threshold. 因此，当位置提供程序提供数据不在这些点 （P1、 P2、 P3 和 P4） 的某个位置，该值指示会引发事件，并返回 P1。So when the location provider supplies data indicating a location at those points (P1, P2, P3, and P4), no events are raised, and returns P1. 外部的为点 P5距离，因此在该点，更新和引发事件。The point P5 is outside of the distance, so at that point, is updated and a event is raised. ![说明 MovementThreshold 的关系图](~/add/media/ndp-movementthreshold.png "演示 MovementThreshold 的关系图")![Diagram illustrating MovementThreshold](~/add/media/ndp-movementthreshold.png "Diagram illustrating MovementThreshold")

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当移动的距离，因为最后一个事件超出指定的阈值时，仅将引发此事件。This event is only raised when the distance moved since the last event exceeds the threshold that is specified by . 传递给事件处理程序对象包括对象，其中包含更新的位置数据。The object passed to the event handler includes the object that contains the updated location data. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何处理第一个事件。The following example shows how to handle the first event. [!code-csharp[System.Device.Location.LocationEvent1#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Misc/system.device.location.locationevent1/cs/locationevent.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Device.Location.LocationEvent1#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Misc/system.device.location.locationevent1/vb/locationevent.vb#1)]

summary.span: 开始从当前位置提供程序的数据的获取。

span.span: Initiate the acquisition of data from the current location provider.

summary.span: 此方法使事件并允许访问属性。

span.span: This method enables events and allows access to the property.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 调用此方法将开始从当前位置提供程序的数据的获取。Calling this method will initiate the acquisition of data from the current location provider. 选择当前的位置提供程序基于如年龄和来自所有提供程序、 请求的应用程序或应用程序和功率消耗的准确性和性能影响与位置提供程序关联的数据的准确性.The current location provider is selected based on factors such as the age and accuracy of the data from all providers, the accuracy requested by the application or applications, and the power consumption and performance impact associated with the location provider. 随着时间推移，例如，当 GPS 设备失去其附属信号功能和 Wi-fi 三角测量提供程序将在计算机上最准确的提供程序可能会更改当前的位置提供程序。The current location provider might change over time, for instance, when a GPS device loses its satellite signal indoors and a Wi-Fi triangulation provider becomes the most accurate provider on the computer. 如果当前设置优先级位置提供程序不具有数据时方法调用时，便会启动以获取数据。If the current prioritized location provider does not have data when the method is called, it will start to acquire data. 如果权限已被授予给客户端，当数据变为可用时，数据可以同步访问，如果正在处理事件以异步方式传递。If the permissions have been granted to the client when the data becomes available, data can be accessed synchronously, and will be delivered asynchronously if events are being handled. 如果禁用了 Windows 7 传感器和位置平台时调用时，将立即返回，请将不会引发事件，并且其位置由返回属性将包含.If the Windows 7 Sensor and Location platform is disabled when is called, will immediately return, events will not be raised, and the location returned by the property of will contain . 如果数据包含有当前按优先顺序排列的位置提供程序，它将立即可用以同步方式，并将以异步方式传递，如果正在处理事件。If the current prioritized location provider does have data, it will be available synchronously immediately, and will be delivered asynchronously if events are being handled. 如果调用应用程序没有从一个位置提供程序访问数据的权限，以授予或拒绝权限的对话框将提示用户。If the calling application does not have permissions to access data from a location provider, the user will be prompted with a dialog box to either grant or deny permission. 将无模式对话框。The dialog box will be modeless. ## Examples 下面的程序处理之后发生的第一个位置更新调用。The following program handles the first location update that occurs after is called. [!code-csharp[System.Device.Location.GetLocationDataUpdateOnce#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Misc/system.device.location.getlocationdataupdateonce/cs/getlocationdataupdateonce.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Device.Location.GetLocationDataUpdateOnce#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Misc/system.device.location.getlocationdataupdateonce/vb/GetLocationDataUpdateOnce.vb#1)]

param.span: 时间 （毫秒） 等待位置提供程序启动后才超时。

span.span: Time in milliseconds to wait for the location provider to start before timing out.

summary.span: 将启动获取从当前位置提供程序的数据。

span.span: Initiates the acquisition of data from the current location provider.

summary.span: 此方法以同步方式返回。

span.span: This method returns synchronously.

returns.span: 如果指定的时间段内启动数据采集; 否则为。

span.span: if data acquisition is started within the time period specified by ; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 该方法会阻止调用线程的执行期间指定的时间段内`timeout`。This method blocks execution of the calling thread during the time period specified by `timeout`. 调用时要格外小心从你的应用程序在用户界面线程。Use caution when calling from the user interface thread of your application. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何调用。The following example demonstrates how to call .
